org.elasticsearch.script

Class ScriptModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.script.ScriptModule

  • public class ScriptModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages building ScriptService and ScriptSettings from a list of plugins.

    • Constructor Summary
